Package com.hcl.currencyexchange.manager

Class ApiManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hcl.currencyexchange.manager.ApiManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatabaseManager
    public class ApiManager
extends java.lang.Object

    Api Manager class

    This class is used to store all the methods used to manipulate the informations came from the API.
    Since:
    2023-05-18

    • Method Detail

      • sendRequestToProvider

        public HistoricalPointsBean sendRequestToProvider​(java.lang.String date,
                                                  java.lang.String toCurr,
                                                  java.lang.String fromCurr)
                                           throws SendRequestToProviderException
        Method used to send a POST request to the API for extracting an exchange from a specific date.
        Parameters:
        date - The date from which the transaction will be retrieved. Date format: YYYY-MM-DD.
        toCurr - The currency ISO to convert into (ex. USD, EUR, etc).
        fromCurr - The currency ISO to be converted (ex. USD, EUR, etc).
        Returns:
        HistoricalPointsBean An object of HistoricalPointsBean class.
        Throws:
        SendRequestToProviderException - if the API does not send the proper response.

      • extractExchangeFromProvider

        public ExchangesEntity extractExchangeFromProvider​(java.lang.String date,
                                                   CurrenciesEntity curFrom,
                                                   CurrenciesEntity curTo)
                                            throws SendRequestToProviderException
        This method is used to cast the object returned by the api into an ExchangesEntity object.
        Parameters:
        date - The date saved into the currency_conversion table. Date format: YYYY-MM-DD.
        curFrom - The object is used to get the specific ID for the currency that will be exchanged.
        curTo - The object is used to get the specific ID for the currency that the user will exchange into.
        Returns:
        ExchangesEntity An object of ExchangesEntity class.
        Throws:
        SendRequestToProviderException - if the sendRequestToProvider method returns null.
